Hello! My name is Peter Kalafatis, I am a Technical Recruiter with PROCOM in Toronto. I am conducting a search for a client of ours in Toronto for a Technical Lead for a permanent position. Please read the description below and if you are interested and qualified, please send me a resume in WORD format. No phone calls please, only suitable candidates will be contacted. THANK YOU!
Position: Java Technical Lead
Required:
RESPONSIBILITIES: · Provide Application Design & Engineering for Loyalty Management Group?s Travel Management Systems during all phases of the system life cycle. · Complete problem solving, addressing business requirements and providing robust systems design. · Support and as required lead the application development activity. · Liaise with Architecture, DB & Integration teams to ensure robust, scalable consistent design. · Provide technology leadership in an J2EE, Oracle DB with WebLogic in depth knowledge · Establish unit and end-to-end performance tests and monitoring. Resolve performance issues in design; support resolution in production environments.
REQUIREMENTS: · 7-10 years Information Technology experience with progressive roles leading to a Technical Lead capability. · Travel industry experience strongly preferred. · Experience with enterprise implementations of J2EE, WebLogic, XML, and Oracle DB. · Sound knowledge of Software Development and Systems Management Life Cycles for enterprise class systems. · Experience with service and capability based system architectures. · Experience with rules based decisions support systems. · Strong written and verbal communication skills at all organizational levels · Flexibility, energy and confidence; ability to drive delivery in dynamic, matrixed organizations. · University Degree in Computer Sciences or Equivalent
Location: Toronto
Duration: Permanent
Rate/Salary: 70-78k Start Date: ASAP
PROCOM SERVICES A leading provider of IT services in North America, PROCOM and PROCOM SERVICES currently have more than 1200 consultants on assignment. For over 20 years, we have been finding high-quality jobs for our consultants. Our policies of maintaining open communication with both clients and consultants consistently make us the IT Firm of Choice.
Please submit your most recent resume to:
Peter Kalafatis peterk@procom.ca www.procom.ca
